entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to 600 metres overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 600 metres. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Snow level 600 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
